page.title: 08GARDENS
page.content:
My Garden by Charlotte Mulley.Aged 7.
My garden is 47 strides long and 37 strides wide.My garden is for playing and growing. We grow flowers and vegetables. We've got half an acre.Our garden looks like its in two bits, but its not.One bit of the garden has got all the flowers in it and one bit has our play things. I play on my bike and I play ball. I can run in my garden. I play with dolls in my garden too. ...................................... My Garden by Katie Ashley. Aged 7. My garden from the front is 110 feet long. I have got a tree in my garden.I have a birdbox on the tree.We have six flowers too. One day my Mummy was looking at the flowers and she saw a hedgehog.Mummy said,"Look,Katie." I saw the hedgehog. My Mummy likes flowers.
